main_definition: Well-liked or widely accepted by a large number of people, often due to being common, trendy, or appealing in some way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Widely liked or admired by many people
meanings_and_examples.example: The singer's new song quickly became popular among fans.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Common and used frequently in a particular area or culture
meanings_and_examples.example: Irish step dancing is very popular in Ireland.
High-waisted jeans are back in style and quite popular right now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Offering a high rate of sales due to widespread appeal
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant's new menu items have been so popular that they sell out every night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In frequent use or in common circulation; frequently encountered
meanings_and_examples.example: Certain phrases and slang terms are very popular on social media platforms like Twitter.
